column1: 254415,Registered Nurse (Critical Care and Emergency),,"Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments
column3: Analyse patient data to determine patient needs or treatment goals
column7: Collect medical information from patients, family members or other medical professionals
column9: Evaluate patient functioning, capabilities or health
column11: Test patient heart or lung functioning
column13: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column15: Monitor patient conditions during treatments, procedures or activities
column17: Administer anaesthetics or sedatives to control pain
column21: Treat acute illnesses, infections or injuries
column23: Operate diagnostic or therapeutic medical instruments or equipment
column29: Administer health care or medical treatments
column31: Interact with patients to build rapport or provide emotional support
column35: Maintain inventory of medical supplies or equipment
column37: Examine medical instruments or equipment to ensure proper operation
column39: Prepare medical supplies or equipment for use
column41: Examine patients to assess general physical condition
column45: Assist health care practitioners during examinations or treatments
column47: Administer blood or other fluids intravenously
column57: Conduct health or safety training programs
